game.name: PrimeCraft
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Explore a universe of tiny planets, swing between worlds, and jump into handcrafted bubble scenes. Train simple AI companions to follow you and join your adventures. A playful physics sandbox you can enjoy solo, online, or in split-screen.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore a universe of tiny planets, swing between worlds, and jump into handcrafted bubble scenes. Train simple AI companions to follow you and join your adventures. A playful physics sandbox you can enjoy solo, online, or in split-screen.
